name: Drams of the Kilburn High
preparation:
This complex and boozy cocktail from the mind of San Francisco’s Michael Hart is the perfect vehicle for triple-casked Irish whiskey. Notes of banana pair exceptionally well with the oak and spice from the whiskey.

Add all the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir.

Strain into chilled coupe glass.

Express the oil from a lemon peel, and discard the peel.

Float a dehydrated banana chip on top.
